      • Topic

        public Topic(java.lang.String topic_name)
        Topic Constructor which creates a new Topic. A Topic describes a query and the relevant documents to a query.
        Parameters:
        topic_name - contains the Topic name and at the same time the query for the Topic.

      • evaluateTopic

        public void evaluateTopic(VectorSpaceModel vs,
                          int number_top_ranked)
        This function performs the evaluation for the topic, by calculating the Average precision over 10 restriction levels. With the variable NUMBER_SAMPLES_PER_RESTRICTION it is possible to change the number of the amount of samples taken per restriction level for getting a better approximation. The evaluation is speed up by using an own method call for caulating the cosine similarity and the pseudo relevance feedback.
        Parameters:
        vs - The initialized VectorSpaceModel which is responsible for the retrieval
        number_top_ranked - integer defining how many top ranked documents to take for pseudo relevance feedback

      • calcAverageRanks

        public void calcAverageRanks()
        Old Function which should calculate the average over all ranks from the set of relevant documents.

      • calcPrecisionAndRecall

        public void calcPrecisionAndRecall(java.util.ArrayList<Doc> resultset)
        Calculates precision and recall for the topic, after applying the cosine similarity calculation or the pseudo relevance feedback calculation.
        Parameters:
        resultset - contains the resultset from cosine similarity caluclation or pseudo relevance feedback calculation

        public void retrieveResultSet(java.util.ArrayList<Doc> docs,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Doc> result_set,

        Extracts the result set from the ArrayList containing all retrieved documents and by not considering the restricted documents
        Parameters:

        result_set - ArrayList in which the result set should be stored
        resultset_size - The size how big the result set should be

        percentage - The current percentage of the JProgressBar

      • calculatingAveragePrecision

        public double calculatingAveragePrecision(java.util.ArrayList<Doc> documents)
        Calculates the average precision over all retrieved documents, by calculating the precision at every position of a relevant document.
        Parameters:
        documents - contains all retrieved documents
        Returns:
        returns the average precision for the Mean Average precision calculation and therefore the evaluation

      • precisionAtTen

        public int precisionAtTen(java.util.ArrayList<Doc> resultset)
        Caluculates the precision at a result set size of ten. Which displays the number of relevant documents in the current ranking step.
        Parameters:
        resultset - Contains the whole result set retrieved from the used ranking method.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of relevant documents in the given result set.

      • getPrecisionAtTenCos

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getPrecisionAtTenCos()
        Returns:
        Returns a ArrayList with the average number of relevant documents, with a result set size of 10 for the cosine similarity ranking.

      • getGetPrecisionAtTenPrf

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getGetPrecisionAtTenPrf()
        Returns:
        Returns a ArrayList with the average number of relevant documents, with a result set size of 10 for pseudo relevance feedback.
